Name: Tom Auger
Comment: This is huge. In 2021 in Ontario Canada there is new legislation requiring WCAG 2.1 AA compliance and Webflow's forms are not WCAG compliant due to inability to properly label form fields. This means Webflow is not longer a valid tool for anyone building websites for Ontario businesses. The rest of the world isn't that far behind (the US is pretty crappy when it comes to ADA etc).
